channel.title: Need help with Teleport to owner.[PI]
channel.description: Is there a way to stop that , im an owner of a server and mods/admins can do ::xteletome (myname) or ::xteleto (me) and teles them to me. Can i do for example: for ::xteletome Says: Im sorry but you cannot teleport this person to you. and for ::xteleto Im sorry you cannot teleport to this person.

item.title: Need help with Teleport to owner.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Using my own code, I used the same line of code that prevents ::bank in the wild.
I don’t know what the exact code would be but I would guess adding
if c2.playerNameequalsIgnorecase (“owner”);
Or something of the sort. I haven’t dealt with that in a while.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Teleport to owner.[PI]

item.title: Need help with Teleport to owner.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @duhelis duhelis
item.description:
@duhelis wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome")) { try { String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(Owner)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You can't teleport " + c.playerName); 
							break;
						} 
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}			
		}</blockquote>

idk if this might work just tried

or try

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteletome UrNick”)) {
c.sendMessage(“How dare you?!!!”);

break;
}

Read full topic
